item.title: Rothschild downgrades two ‘Magnificent Seven’ giants, cites lower conviction on AI trade
item.description: Rothschild and Redburn sees shares of Microsoft moving 1% lower, and shares of Amazon adding 7% from here.

item.title: Alphabet rallies after Berkshire reveals stake. Why Buffett’s firm likely bought it
item.description: Despite the stellar rally in 2025, Alphabet's valuation remains lower than many of its AI-driven megacap peers.

item.title: Peter Thiel's hedge fund dumps Nvidia stake, cuts back Tesla position
item.description: Thiel Macro zeroed out its Nvidia stake worth nearly $94 million during the third quarter.

item.title: A correction in Cathie Wood's ARKK ETF is set to deepen, says Katie Stockton
